fields.description:
Haven't seen this issue in previous SDKs.

To reproduce:

1. Create a default Alloy app
2. After seeing the index window opened, click "Back" to exit the app
3. Relaunch the app again
4. Now the app is stuck at splash screen with this log info:
[INFO] :   TiRootActivity: (main) [0,0] checkpoint, on root activity create, savedInstanceState: null

I think this is a critical issue. Originally reported here: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/39657250/titanium-stuck-on-splash-when-app-taken-in-background

Video: https://youtu.be/INpb-3M66U4?t=1m55s
fields.summary: Android - Relaunched app stuck at splash screen

comments.body: Hello, On the other ticket the issue is fixed in the SDK: 6.0.0.v20160930084353, 6.1.0.v20160930092242. The fixed was varified. Closing this. Thanks.
